channel.title: glazeruns TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

item.title: third time's a charm #moab240 #runtok
item.description: third time's a charm #moab240 #runtok

item.title: Big thanks Cody and Nick. Team don't let Andy DNF DNF = did not fail #moab240 #runtok
item.description: Big thanks Cody and Nick. Team don't let Andy DNF DNF = did not fail #moab240 #runtok

item.title: the white whale is no more#runtok #moab240
item.description: the white whale is no more#runtok #moab240

item.title: Moab 240 put my feet through absolute hell. Rain, rivers, streams, endless mud. My feet were never dry. Not once. For 98 hours. But my overall foot strategy worked: 1.) KT tape around the toes 2.) @getsaltybritches lube coating my entire foot 3.) @feeture
item.description: Moab 240 put my feet through absolute hell. Rain, rivers, streams, endless mud. My feet were never dry. Not once. For 98 hours. But my overall foot strategy worked: 1.) KT tape around the toes 2.) @getsaltybritches lube coating my entire foot 3.) @feeture

item.title: Pretty sure that's trench foot on my big toe. I did retape my feet often, relube them with Salty Britches, new socks. I used the same shoes the whole time. Hoka Challenger 8s. Seems nothing survived. #moab240 #runtok
item.description: Pretty sure that's trench foot on my big toe. I did retape my feet often, relube them with Salty Britches, new socks. I used the same shoes the whole time. Hoka Challenger 8s. Seems nothing survived. #moab240 #runtok

item.title: Lost 13 pounds and my mind, but finished the race. And spoiler alert, it was hard. hope you enjoy a window into my soul for 98 hours of forward motion. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #moab240
item.description: Lost 13 pounds and my mind, but finished the race. And spoiler alert, it was hard. hope you enjoy a window into my soul for 98 hours of forward motion. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #moab240

item.title: I really appreciate you all Smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok #moab240
item.description: I really appreciate you all Smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok #moab240

item.title: Can you smell them through the screen? Mildew, Sweat, and Dirt Smile, or you're doing it wrong
item.description: Can you smell them through the screen? Mildew, Sweat, and Dirt Smile, or you're doing it wrong

item.title: Not sponsored. Just my thoughts after 240 miles in mud, rivers, rain, and desert. #runtok #moab240
item.description: Not sponsored. Just my thoughts after 240 miles in mud, rivers, rain, and desert. #runtok #moab240

item.title: Moab 240 photo dump. Big thanks to my crew Cody and Nick. #moab240 #runtok

item.title: The grind continues #runtok #moab240
item.description: The grind continues #runtok #moab240

item.title: And lots of sleeping. Told you my feet were swollen after Moab 240. Smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok #moab240
item.description: And lots of sleeping. Told you my feet were swollen after Moab 240. Smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok #moab240

item.title: First, why did I say sushi like that? must be the canker sores. Second, I forgot I also had some amazing pizza as well. Hope this helps. #moab240 #runtok
item.description: First, why did I say sushi like that? must be the canker sores. Second, I forgot I also had some amazing pizza as well. Hope this helps. #moab240 #runtok

item.title: Have a crew, pacers, and van obviously was a huge game changer. Sleeping in a bed in the van allowed me to get deep sleep and I woke up feeling pretty refreshed. Well, as refreshed as one can feel after running hundreds of miles. Total i probably slept 6-
item.description: Have a crew, pacers, and van obviously was a huge game changer. Sleeping in a bed in the van allowed me to get deep sleep and I woke up feeling pretty refreshed. Well, as refreshed as one can feel after running hundreds of miles. Total i probably slept 6-

item.title: Lost 13 pounds. follow me for more weight loss tips. Moab 240 was hard. #moab240 #runtok
item.description: Lost 13 pounds. follow me for more weight loss tips. Moab 240 was hard. #moab240 #runtok

item.title: If you see me at Javelina, please say hi. I promise I don't bite Smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok
item.description: If you see me at Javelina, please say hi. I promise I don't bite Smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok

item.title: How to make a 100 miler harder? Run a 240 miler the week before. Follow me for more life hacks. #runtok
item.description: How to make a 100 miler harder? Run a 240 miler the week before. Follow me for more life hacks. #runtok

item.title: I'd be faster if I was going with the current. #runtok #moab240
item.description: I'd be faster if I was going with the current. #runtok #moab240

item.title: Javelina 100 miler this Saturday is an ultramarathon and Halloween party mixed in one. Last time I ran it as Post Malone with fake face tattoos and a grill. Time to get loopy.
item.description: Javelina 100 miler this Saturday is an ultramarathon and Halloween party mixed in one. Last time I ran it as Post Malone with fake face tattoos and a grill. Time to get loopy.

item.title: Ranked #1 out of thousands of firefighters tested. Big thanks to @dr.danielhiguera and the Mt. SAC Fit program for putting me through the gauntlet, blood work, 12-lead EKG, blood pressure, breathing tests, grip strength, push-ups, jumping, planks, body co
item.description: Ranked #1 out of thousands of firefighters tested. Big thanks to @dr.danielhiguera and the Mt. SAC Fit program for putting me through the gauntlet, blood work, 12-lead EKG, blood pressure, breathing tests, grip strength, push-ups, jumping, planks, body co

item.title: I've been running for decades, and there's one piece of gear I've used longer than anything else. Not my shoes. Not my watch. Not even my jorts. My @feetures socks. I'm so happy to be partnering with Feetures, a brand I've trusted for years. From UTMB in
item.description: I've been running for decades, and there's one piece of gear I've used longer than anything else. Not my shoes. Not my watch. Not even my jorts. My @feetures socks. I'm so happy to be partnering with Feetures, a brand I've trusted for years. From UTMB in

item.title: After finishing a big race everything falls apart for a short period. I was a hot mess, but Lauren got me back together after a shower and shit. Some food and a nap. #runtok
item.description: After finishing a big race everything falls apart for a short period. I was a hot mess, but Lauren got me back together after a shower and shit. Some food and a nap. #runtok

item.title: Javelina Jundred put my feet through the ringer. Hot, dry, sandy desert trails with tons of sharp rocks gave my feet some issues. But my overall foot strategy worked: 1.) KT tape around the toes 2.) @getsaltybritches lube coating my entire foot 3.) @feet
item.description: Javelina Jundred put my feet through the ringer. Hot, dry, sandy desert trails with tons of sharp rocks gave my feet some issues. But my overall foot strategy worked: 1.) KT tape around the toes 2.) @getsaltybritches lube coating my entire foot 3.) @feet

item.title: I'll continue using this shoe for many more miles. Just like a fresh pair for a race. I'm really enjoying the new challenger 8s. Big improvement from the 7s. IMHO. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #javelinajundred
item.description: I'll continue using this shoe for many more miles. Just like a fresh pair for a race. I'm really enjoying the new challenger 8s. Big improvement from the 7s. IMHO. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #javelinajundred

item.title: Javelina Jundred ✅️ Big thanks to @troycroxdale for pacing me the last 20 miles. Big thanks to aravaipa running for putting on another great event. Big thanks to all the volunteers who kept me iced and hydrated throughout the race. Big thanks to everyone
item.description: Javelina Jundred ✅️ Big thanks to @troycroxdale for pacing me the last 20 miles. Big thanks to aravaipa running for putting on another great event. Big thanks to all the volunteers who kept me iced and hydrated throughout the race. Big thanks to everyone

item.title: 25,000 votes and Waldo won. i am a man of my word. Javelina 100: Done. 22:05. 11 days after finishing Moab 240. 98 hours and 239 miles in the desert, then barely over a week later, back out for another hundred. One minute faster than my previous Javelina
item.description: 25,000 votes and Waldo won. i am a man of my word. Javelina 100: Done. 22:05. 11 days after finishing Moab 240. 98 hours and 239 miles in the desert, then barely over a week later, back out for another hundred. One minute faster than my previous Javelina

item.title: This is my Feetures Merino 10 Ultra Light 100 Mile Glaze Pack. I got to pick the colors myself: blue, green, and black. I wanted socks that could match my personality each day. Since Feetures doesn’t make jort-colored socks, I went with the ones I liked b
item.description: This is my Feetures Merino 10 Ultra Light 100 Mile Glaze Pack. I got to pick the colors myself: blue, green, and black. I wanted socks that could match my personality each day. Since Feetures doesn’t make jort-colored socks, I went with the ones I liked b

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
item.description: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
